name: Andre M Chagas
cooked:
Hi @petmar,

I see that this is a somewhat older post, but maybe you are still actively working on this project. In this case, I would suggest to take a look at the GOSH community forum. There are a lot of people producing extremely interesting instruments for science there!

Best,
Andre
raw:
Hi @petmar,

I see that this is a somewhat older post, but maybe you are still actively working on this project. In this case, I would suggest to take a look at the [GOSH community forum](https://forum.openhardware.science/). There are a lot of people producing extremely interesting instruments for science there!

Best,
Andre
